import React from "react"; // import FormGroup from "@mui/material/FormGroup"; import { useFormik } from "formik"; // import * as Yup from 'yup'; import FormControl from "@mui/material/FormControl"; import FormLabel from "@mui/material/FormLabel"; import Select from "@mui/material/Select"; import InputLabel from "@mui/material/InputLabel"; import { Avatar } from "@material-ui/core"; import MenuItem from "@mui/material/MenuItem"; import { Tab, Tabs, TabList, TabPanel } from "react-tabs"; import "react-tabs/style/react-tabs.css"; import StateData from "../../Util/States.json"; // import { ReactComponent as WalletSvg } from '../../Assets/svg/wallet.svg'; // Component Imports // import { AccountSummary } from '../Pages/NewLoan/AccountSummary'; function NewLoan() { const basic = useFormik({ initialValues: { firstName: "", lastName: "", email: "", applicationFor: "New", gender: "Male", dob: "", maritalStatus: "single", occupation: "", yearsToRetirement: "", indebtedToBank: "No", country: "Nigeria", stateOfOrigin: "", lga: "", city: "", street: "", stateOfResidence: "", altPhone: "", primaryPhone: "", idType: "", idNumber: "", idExpiryDate: "", }, onSubmit: (values) => { console.log("Basic Info", basic.values); localStorage.setItem('basic', JSON.stringify(basic)) }, }); const loanInfo = useFormik({ initialValues: { loanType: "", loanAmount: 0, collateral: "", numberOfRepayments: 36, interest: 15, maxRepayablePeriod: 38, additionalInfo: "", }, onSubmit: (values) => { console.log("loanInfo", loanInfo.values); localStorage.setItem('loanInfo', JSON.stringify(loanInfo)) }, }); const bankInfo = useFormik({ initialValues: { accountName: "", accountNumber: "", banker: "", checkNumber: "", salary: 0, }, onSubmit: (values) => { console.log("bankInfo", bankInfo.values); localStorage.setItem('bankInfo', JSON.stringify(bankInfo)) }, }); localStorage.getItem('bankInfo') const employerGuarantor = useFormik({ initialValues: { employerName: "", address: { street: "", city: "", state: "", }, guarantorName: "", email: "", phone: "", officeId: 0, yearsToRetirement: "", colleague: "Yes", }, onSubmit: (values) => { console.log("employerGuarantor Info", employerGuarantor.values); localStorage.setItem('employerGuarantor', JSON.stringify(employerGuarantor)) }, }); localStorage.getItem('basic', 'loanInfo', 'bankInfo', 'employerGuarantor'); return (
